text: Nicolaas Marinus Hugenholtz (born 1924) is a Dutch physicist. He was a professor of theoretical physics at the University of Groningen between 1960 and 1989. He obtained his PhD in physics at Utrecht University in 1957 with a thesis titled: "The quantum theory of large systems and its application to the structure of nuclear matter". Hugenholtz was elected a member of the Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences in 1988. ==References== Category:1924 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch physicists Category:Members of the Royal Netherlands Academy of Arts and Sciences Category:Theoretical physicists Category:University of Groningen faculty Category:Utrecht University alumni
title: Nicolaas Marinus Hugenholtz
